ValidationRule.description: Any opportunity that is a Current CVS TDC / Aetna Client, must have a Client Proposal Preference filled out before the record could be saved.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, 'Renewal')) && INCLUDES(Account__r.Account_Grouping__c, "Current CVS TDC/Aetna Clients" ) && (ISPICKVAL(StageName__c, "Proposal") || ISPICKVAL(StageName__c, "Review/Negotiation") || ISPICKVAL(StageName__c, "Contracting")) && ISBLANK( TEXT( Client_Proposal_Preference__c )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, "TD"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Any opportunity that is a Current CVS TDC / Aetna Client, must have a Client Proposal Preference filled out before the record could be saved.
